Source code for pygpseq.tools.string

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

""" Functions for the management of strings """


[docs]def add_trailing_new_line(s):
	"""Adds trailing new line. """
	if '\n' != s[len(s) - 1]:
		s += '\n'
	return(s)



[docs]def add_leading_dot(s, not_empty = None):
	"""Adds leading dot.

	Args:
		s (string): string to recieve leading dot.
		not_empty (bool): whether to add leading dot to empty string.
	"""
	
	if None == not_empty:
		not_empty = True
	if 0 == len(s) and not_empty:
		return(s)
	if not s.startswith('.'):
		s = '.' + s
	return(s)
